DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , multi-center , double-blind , placebo-controlled , multi-dose , parallel-group study . Approximately 300 subject ( 150 per group ) 16 year age old current ( within 24 hour Visit 1 ) Grade I II ankle sprain , meet eligibility criterion , randomize study receive either active treatment ( SST-0225 ibuprofen cream ) , match placebo . Subjects apply amount equivalent 4 inch line investigational product affect ankle approximately every 4-6 hour . At Visit 1 two dos apply site . All subsequent dos investigational product apply every 4 6 hour total 4 dos 24 hour period . Duration treatment investigational product 7 day .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety SST 0225 , Topical Ibuprofen Cream , Treatment Pain Associated With Acute Ankle Sprain
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female subject ≥16 year age 2 . Grade I II acute ankle sprain injury within 24 hour prior first use investigational product . 1 . Grade I : ligament stretch torn anterior talofibular ligament usually involve . The anterior drawer test negative 2 . Grade II : moderate sprain , usually result partial tear ligament , primarily anterior talofibular possibly calcaneofibular ligament . Ligamentous laxity may present moderate swell 3 . At screen ( Visit 1 ) , subject report pain intensity score upon movement ≥ 5 010 Numerical Rating Scale ( NRS ) 4 . Subject 's Assessment Normal Function/Activity ( must > 2 ) screen 5 . Able comply visit schedule 6 . Able apply investigational product direct 7 . Females childbearing potential must willing use approve method birth control study participation . Subjects currently use mention contraception method , must use method minimum three month prior study enrollment , must willing continue use ( dose ) throughout study . 1 . Effective method birth control : e.g . prescription oral , vaginal transdermal contraceptive ; contraceptive implant injection ; intrauterine device ; diaphragm/cervical cap/condom spermicide 2 . Other acceptable method birth control include : Postmenopausal amenorrhea one year , Surgically sterile ( hysterectomy , tubal ligation , oopherectomy ) , Premenarcheal 8 . Able speak , read comprehend English record request measurement outline protocol 9 . Subject must able read , understand , sign date inform consent document ( subject assent form , necessary ) indicate subject ( legally acceptable representative ) inform pertinent aspect trial Subjects meeting follow criterion enter study : 1 . Similar injury joint within last 6 month 2 . Clinical evidence complete rupture ankle ligament ( third degree sprain ) 3 . Requirements bed rest , hospitalization , surgical intervention ankle injury 4 . Evidence fracture nonremovable full cast type 5 . Presence bilateral occurrence ankle injury ipsilateral ankle and/or knee injury 6 . Open wound infection site injury 7 . Significant Skin irritation application site ; 8 . Use long half life NSAID within 12 hour prior study entry ( Appendix 4 ) 9 . Does agree use supplied investigational product rescue medication analgesia seven day study expect require analgesic study pain ankle pain 10 . Presence history allergy intolerance aspirin , NSAIDs , acetaminophen excipients investigational product ( LArginine hydrochloride , Glyceryl Stearate , Cetyl Alcohol , Squalane , Xanthan Gum , Isopropyl Myristate , Oleic Acid , Propylene Glycol , Polysorbate 20 ) 11 . Medical condition include : peptic ulcer disease ; clinically important gastrointestinal , renal , hepatic disease within past 6 month ; clinically significant cardiovascular disease stable past 6 month ; uncontrolled hypertension indicate systolic blood pressure great equal 160 mmHg diastolic blood pressure great equal 100 mm Hg ; coagulation disorder hematologic disease ; history seizure ; know , significant , preexisting condition would affect interpretation potential adverse reaction study medication 12 . Known alcohol abuse , drug dependency , history significant psychiatric illness within past 12 month 13 . Females pregnant lactating .
